description: This file defines the `NotesProvider` class in Dart, which manages the state and operations related to notes in a Flutter application. It interacts with a notes repository to load, add, edit, delete, and synchronize notes, and notifies listeners about state changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages notes data and related actions in a Flutter app.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the repository, updating the internal list and notifying listeners.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query and triggers reloading of notes based on the new query.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note through the repository and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: editNote
methods.description: Edits an existing note via the repository and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note using the repository and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: sync
methods.description: Synchronizes notes with external storage and updates the loading state accordingly.
